item.title: Listening to… Studio 360, American Icons: I Love Lucy
item.description: Getting caught up on  Studio 360's American Icons series.  When they play clips from the show, I recall the episodes and start laughing slightly as I remember how funny the show was.  Can't wait for the enjoy it again with the kids when they are older.
